wantToBeAlone: l%unhide l%*sigh* As you wish your Highness. You can still take a little time for yourself I am sure.
lIf you do not mind, there is a request on your desk which need to be treated by the end of the week.
l%unhide l%I am at your service your Highness, I hope to see you soon.
toThePort: l%unhide l%That's bigger than I thought! So, your Highness, what should we do?
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Send your men and kill this thing" killTheHydraGuard "*Leave the head guard and approach the hydra*" hydraDialog%
hydraDialog: r%unhide r%Arrgh, help me, they attacked me!
l%unhide l%(Choose your answer): %choices "Explain me what happened" listenHydra "Help a monster like you? Ah, what a joke!" killedHydra%
listenHydra: r%unhide r%I was hunting as always near the island northeast from here. I was under water when I felt something in my flesh.

rI did not see a thing, but I know for sure it comes from the inhabitants from the island near where I was. I always founded them menacing towards me. I am famished and hurt, please, do something to help me.

l%unhide l%(Choose your answer): %choices "I can launch an attack on the island inhabitant, you will be able to hunt in peace." startWar "Let me offer you some food, and I will ask my mage to heal you!" endDialogHydra "Stay here, no one will dare to hurt you ever again, trust me." hydraStay "*Make a sign to the capitain of the guard for him to kill the hydra*" killHydra%
killTheHydraGuard: l%unhide l%At your command your Highness.
beginning: l%setSprite icon_advisor_right 24 0 32 64%Your highness! You cannot flee the hall, all your guests wish to see you!%skip%
r%unhide r%There are here to mourn my father, not to see me. Who care where I am?
l%unhide l%You are the heir, of course they care!
r%unhide r%They care because they want to be in my good grace.
rMy father died two days ago, and they're already plotting. I'm far better off from them.
l%unhide l%You will be crowned in one year and will start taking decision for our country starting the next week.
lThey are the noblemen of your country, you need their support.
lPlease, your Highness, reconsider your decision.
lHave you thought about what they will think of you if you stay here?
lBeing absent on the day of your father's funeral...

r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "I don't care about what they think!" wantToBeAlone "I just need some time alone; I am sure they can understand" wantToBeAlone "Maybe I should go back then..." goBackToTheFuneral%
week7: l%setSprite icon_captain_guard_right 24 0 32 64%Your Highness! It's an emergency!
r%unhide r%*sigh* Have you never learned to knock at a door?
l%unhide l%Knock a door? Of course I have! But it has nothing to do with our business.
r%unhide r%Then why can't you...%skip%%hide r%
l%unhide l%There is a hydra in the port.
l%unhide l%There is a hydra in the port.
r%unhide r%The hell? What is it doing here?
l%unhide l%Dunno. It's hurt, I thought you would like to be informed. What should we do about it?

r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Lead me to the port, I have to see it by my own eyes" toThePort "Take some men with you and bring me its head" killTheHydraGuard "It must not be important, it will leave or die soon enough"%
week12: l%setSprite icon_captain_guard_right 24 0 32 64%Your Highness! We have kind of a problem
r%unhide r%What do you mean by problem?
l%unhide l%Well, you know, the beasts living in the mountain?
l%unhide l%Well, they don't leave in the mountain anymore
r%unhide r%I'm not sure to understand.
l%unhide l%I can't be clearer. Before, the beasts were in the mountain, now they're not.
r%unhide r%And? Where are they? Where is the problem?
l%unhide l%They are near Nasir. They have already eaten five people.
r%unhide r%What? Why didn't you begin with this?
l%unhide l%But I just told you we had a problem!
r%unhide r%But you could have directly told me the problem, not the fact that we had a problem.
l%unhide l%I can't just enter telling you they're beasts everywhere.
r%unhide r%How so everywhere? You only talk about Nasir!
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "I need to see it by me eyes, we go to Nasir" toNasir "Send men to protect our people. NOW" sendMen "I'm not sure of what to do. I need time to reflect"%
toNasir: l%unhide l%(Choose what to do): %choices "Approach it" talkWolf "Send men to kill it"%
toNasir_f: l%unhide l%(Choose what to do): %choices "Approach it" talkWolf "Send men to kill it"%
talkWolf: lWhat are you doing so far away from the mountain?
l%unhide l%(Choose what to do): %choices "Leave" leave "Send men to kill it" leave%
wolfFood: l%unhide l%(Choose what to do): %choices "Give it food" wolfFoodGiven "Leave" leave "Send men to kill it"%
wolfFoodGiven: l%unhide l%Can you answer my question now?
r%unhide r%It's because of the mountain. There is something strange with it. It's shaking and the water coming out of it tastes strange.
rWe don't know what provoc this, but we can feel it. Something strange and dangerous is happening. We just want to put as much distance with the mountain as we can.
rI will leave now. Thanks again for the food.
l%unhide l%Hmm, maybe I should talk about it with my advisor
sendMen: l%unhide l%At your command your Highness!
A: l%unhide l%Guard Captain: What? Why do you give so much importance to what some random people told you?
lGuard Captain: Okey, the sulfur in the lake can be worrisome, but not to the point where we have no other choice than leave. We must protect our home! Where would we be going otherwise?
lAdvisor: It is his Highness choice, we must make our preparation
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Maybe it will be better to stay and protect our cities from whatever will come" B "*say nothing*" C%
C: l%unhide l%Advisor: I am sure you made the right choice your Highness, we should prepare our departure right away. We have many things to take in account. Where should we begin...
lGuard Captain: The most important of course! The people, we need to call them to the capital for them to flee with us.
lGuard Captain: I hope their will be enough boat for everyone. And enough food. And we will need men to escort them, there are still monsters attacking people on the roads.
lGuard Captain: And what about where we will be going? We surely can't stay on the sea for months!
lAdvisor: One thing after another my friend. Let's start with the logistic.
lAdvisor: So, if we need to flee by the sea, we should first make sure to have enough boat.
l%unhide l%Advisor: We do not have many boats, we should build new one.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Build more boats (20G)" NewBoat "We must rely on the few boats in our possession" C2%
WarBoat: lAdvisor: We still have many vessels left from the war, so I do not think it should be a problem, but we can still build more boats to ensure everyone safety.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Build more boats (10G)" NewBoat "We have more than enough boats" C2%
MageBoat: lAdvisor: Thanks to the mage, we should be able to produce new boat quite easily.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Build more boats (10G)" NewBoat "We must rely on the few boats in our possession" C2%
IslandBoat: l%unhide l%Advisor: We do not have many boats, we should build new one. But we can also ask for help to your husband, hoping he will come before the disaster.
lGuard Captain: And how do you intend to send him a message, with one oy our precious boats?
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Send a man in our fastest ship" MessageSend "Maybe it's safer to just build more boats (20G)" NewBoat "We must rely on the few boats in our possession" C2%
IslandMageBoat: l%unhide l%Advisor: We do not have many boats, we should build new one. But we can also ask for help to your husband, hoping he will come before the disaster.
lGuard Captain: And how do you intend to send him a message, with one oy our precious boats?
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Send a man in our fastest ship" MessageSend "Maybe it's safer to just build more boats (10G)" NewBoat "We must rely on the few boats in our possession" C2%
IslandHydraBoat: r%unhide r%We can send the hydra.
l%unhide l%Guard Captain: It almost got killed last time it approaches the island, not sure it's a good idea.
r%unhide r%Well, with someone on it, it should be ok no? It's faster than a boat so it should arrive right on time.
l%unhide l%Guard Captain: Riding a hydra, I will be jealous of one of my own men I think...
l%unhide l%Advisor: Hm, hm! So, what do we do?

r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Send the hydra with one of our men" hydraMessageSend "Send a man in our fastest ship" MessageSend "Maybe it's safer to just build more boats (20G)" NewBoat "We must rely on the few boats in our possession" C2%
IslandHydraMageBoat: r%unhide r%We can send the hydra.
l%unhide l%Guard Captain: It almost got killed last time it approaches the island, not sure it's a good idea.
r%unhide r%Well, with someone on it, it should be ok no? It's faster than a boat so it should arrive right on time.
l%unhide l%Guard Captain: Riding a hydra, I will be jealous of one of my own men I think...
l%unhide l%Advisor: Hm, hm! So, what do we do?

r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Send the hydra with one of our men" hydraMessageSend "Send a man in our fastest ship" MessageSend "Maybe it's safer to just build more boats (10G)" NewBoat "We must rely on the few boats in our possession" C2%
NewBoat: l%unhide l%Advisor: Alright, I will make sure the production start right away.
C2: l%unhide l%Advisor: Now, about our destination. Sir Ilan is right, we will not be able to stay to long on the sea. I think it will be best to plan to leave for quite long. So we should plan to go somewhere.
C21: r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "What about the island on the northeast?" FleeNortheast "We could try to cross the sea, who know, maybe there is something out there?" FleeAcrosseSea "I don't think whatever will happen would be this long, we will just wait on the sea for a month" FleeSea%
FleeNortheast: l%unhide l%Guard Captain: Hmm, was there island out there?
lAdvisor: Yes there is, but we never truly entered in contact with the inhabitants, if there are some.

r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "There are people, they hurt the hydra, but I don't think they will attack us. We will go there" FleeNortheastSure "Hmm, they hurt the hydra, maybe we shouldn't go there" C21%
FNWW: l%unhide l%Guard Captain: Oh yeah, I remember! We were in war against them and killed all their crowned heads, didn't we? Ahah, such weak people...
lAdvisor: Hum hum, yes, it is them. And for this exact reason, I am not sure it is the best place to go.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "They shouldn't be a treat anymore, we'll go there" FleeNortheastSure "Maybe we should go elsewhere" C21%
FNWWPB: l%unhide l%Guard Captain: Oh yeah, I remember! We were in war against them and killed almost all their crowned heads, didn't we? But you let their prince go, I never understood why...
lAdvisor: I do not know how they will react if we go there, knowing what happened...
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "They shouldn't be a treat anymore, we'll go there" FleeNortheastSure "Maybe we should go elsewhere" C21%
FNMI: l%unhide l%Guard Captain: Oh yeah, you married one of their crowned head or something like that no? 'should be a good idea.
lAdvisor: Yes, I am sure they will greet us arms open!
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Yes, it definitely looks like a good idea, let's go there" FleeNortheastSure "I don't know... Maybe we should go elsewhere" C21%
FNE: l%unhide l%Guard Captain: Oh yeah, some trader go out there last year, no?
lAdvisor: Yes indeed, we have a good relationship with them, it may be a good idea.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Yes, let's go there" FleeNortheastSure "I don't know... Maybe we should go elsewhere" C21%
FleeAcrosseSea: l%unhide l%Advisor: You sure? Well, let's hope we will have enough resources, because I do not know how far it can be, if there is something.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "I am sure we will find something" FleeSeaSure "Hmm, maybe we should go elsewhere then" C21%
FleeSea: l%unhide l%Advisor: Let's just hope it will not last long them. I do not think our people will appreciate living on a boat for too long.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "I am sure it won't last too long" FleeSeaSure "Hmm, maybe we should go elsewhere then" C21%
B: l%unhide l%Advisor: Are you sure your Highness? We do not know what await us, how can we prepare ourselves to protect us from something unheard of before? I respect your opinion of course, but I sincerely fear the worst.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Maybe it will be better to leave so no matter what happens, it won't reach us" A "*say nothing*" D%
D: l%unhide l%Guard Captain: It's better like this your Highness, we can't just flee in front of the slightest problem! Well, let's prepare our defenses against I don't know what ahah!
lAdvisor: You seem too enthusiast when we know we must face a disaster.
lGuard Captain: But we know nothing about this disaster! Maybe nothing will happen!
lAdvisor: Or maybe we will all die...
lGuard Captain: You worry yourself too much. Well let's begin! We must decide how we will protect our people
lAdvisor: The most efficient way would surely be for them to come here
F0: l%unhide l%Advisor: Now, let's talk about when we should call our people here. If we want our people to be able to embark before the disaster strikes, we should ask them to come at the capital. The sooner the better.
F: lAdvisor: But of course, we will not be able to get any resources if they are here.
lAdvisor: We could also wait one month or two before calling them here, but we do not know when the disaster will come, and maybe it will be too late for some of them to join us.

r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Ask them to come right away" F1 "I am sure we can still wait a bit" F2 "I am sure we can still wait two or three months" F3 "I am sure we can still wait for three or four months" F3%
F1: l%unhide l%Advisor: Alright your Highness, I will call them right away.
F2: l%unhide l%Advisor: As you wish your Highness. I will take care of this when the time will come.
F3: l%unhide l%Advisor: As you wish your Highness. I will take care of this when the time will come.
MageHelpStay: lGuard Captain: Oh and, yes, didn't the mage wished to study the island, or I don't know what? Let's ask them to study more so we know what will happen!
lAdvisor: It may be a good idea, they may discover something helpful to counter the disaster. But we could also ask them to help us to protect our people.
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "Ask them to pursue their study, they could find something" MageDisaster "I need them to protect our people" MageShield%
MageDisaster: l%unhide l%Advisor: Right away your Highness.
MageShield: l%unhide l%Advisor: As you wish your Highness.
EndMeeting: lAdvisor: I do not think we can do more now. I hope you made the right choices. Our lives depend on your decisions after all.
lGuard Captain: I trust your choice your Highness! Don't worry too much!
meeting: rThank you for coming here, we must talk about what happen with the mountain.
l%unhide l%Guard Captain: It's just a mountain no? What should we worry about?

lAdvisor: The data we got are quite concerning I must say. Earth shakes, sulfur in the lack. I fear the worst your Highness. Maybe we should prepare ourselves to leave the island for some time, just in case.
lGuard Captain: Leave the island? Ah! Does the earth shaking a little scare you this much? And to go where? We must stay, who care about a mountain. No matter what happen, we will resist.
lAdvisor: What is your opinion on the question your Highness?
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "We should make our preparations to leave" A "We will stay" B%
week15: lYour Highness! It's the mountain! There is fire errupting from it!
r%unhide r%What? What do you mean by errupting.
l%unhide l%Look by yourself, it is a true disaster, what will we become?
r%unhide r%(Choose your answer): %choices "We... We must flee! To the port!" lateFlee "We must protect the city!" lateStay%
Z: lIt is the disaster your Highness! I am sure everything will be alright. It must be.
